Часто слышу, как все ждут выхода Half-Life 3. А сам и во вторую не играл. Решил вот сыграть, заоодно и карточки получить, а то несколько лет лежит без дела. И ребят, ей богу затянуло. Достаточно интересный сценарий. Отличное управление, как у самого персонажа, так и управление транспортными средствами. Не хватает порой указателей, не понятно, что делать, 5 минут бегаешь думаешь, а по сути все это быстро нужно делать, что все получалось синхронно. Так вот, затянуло меня так, что прошел все эпизоды. Мне и правда понравилось. Моментами в игре можно отложить пару кирпичеков. Теперь думаю, нужно ли первую часть проходить, когда уже прошел вторую. Но наверное не удержусь, пройду)

This game was extremely good, the story is amazing, the graphics are great (especially for 2004), and the gameplay is amazing. I recommend this game a 10/10, just like all of the other games. It is just amazing.

Pros
Great graphics, but not the best (the game is from 2004)
Not very confusing like the other games.
The difficulty is perfect.

Cons
One of the chapters are not that fun IMO, you will probably think the same thing.
Sometimes the enemies may be to easy, but not much.

Conclusion
The game does not cost that much to purchase, it is only $9.99 as of 7/7/17. I highly recommend getting this, or if it is on sale I would reccomend getting the Half Life Complete bundle like I did. Anyways I rate this game a 10/10 and hope you enjoy it also if you decide to buy it.

Ceci est  un jeu de TRES bonne qualité.

La storyline est cohérente, et n'es jamais redondante comme dans Half Life 1 (Labo, zombie, millitaire, labo zombie millitaire, labo, zombies, et... OH! SUPER MILLITAIRES). L'environnement est beau, et les petits détails m'ont bien fait plaisir: exemple, les systèmes de cordes et d'axes (balancoires), les poulies et treuils des ascenceurs, les bascules... Tout ça m'a fait réaliser à quel point Garry's Mod était Half Life 2 en mode "création".
Contrairement à l'épisode précédent, je ne me suis jamais ennuyé, (presque) jamais perdu. A la fin du premier épisode, j'ai ressenti une satisfaction et un "soulagement" (avant la scène flippante du G-Man bien sur) tandis que dans le 2, (toujours avant la scène intriquante du G-Man) j'ai eu un bref contentement ( *SPOILER* subitement arrêté par l'explosion *SPOILER*).

Et puis BORDEL DE MERDE, QUEL AMBIANCE! Tout es super immersif, et je n'ai vu que 1 seul défaut mineur (la voix d'Alyx est horriblement mal jouée xD).
 - Des graphismes qui n'ont rien à envier aux Russes
 - La meilleure invention du jeux vidéo: le GRAVITY GUN (En troisième place après le Portal Gun et le grappin de JC3 bien évidemment)
 - Des musiques bien placées
 - Casser la gueule à toute sortes de trucs qui volent
 - une bonne durée de vie (13h pour moi sans jouer le chasseur de succès)

Acheter ce jeu est absolument le meilleur investissement que vous pouvez faire dans votre vie. Même une mine d'uranium au Mali c'est moins bien (les colonies, c'est gratuit!) enfin bref.

PS: j'ai compris que depuis le début nous ne sommes pas un employé de Black Mesa, mais du G-Man lui même.

小的时候，偶然的机会在同学家看到这款名为《半条命2》的游戏。好奇之下，就从同学那里借来玩了下，当时还小，什么都不知道，但是就是深深地被这款游戏给吸引住。暑假就打了一遍又一遍，着迷戈登和爱丽克斯的故事，心中的神作，没有之一。趁着这次夏季特惠，正好补上正版，也顺便把所有的成就给完成了，也算是对得起以前对这款游戏的喜爱吧。   另外[spoiler] 如果有可能，我还是会等着下一部续作的[/spoiler]

Many people say that HL2 is one of the best first person games ever, but I strongly disagree with that. Although it is a very good game, it's not a "masterpiece" as many reviewers claim it to be. So yeah, if you want to try it - you are welcome, lots of fine gameplay here, but don't expect it to be over-the-top exciting.
8/10.

Forse sono di parte. O forse no. Ma la trama di Half-Life è quella che mi ha coinvolto in maggior modo nel mio epriodo di adolescente. Half-Life 2 è uno di quei pochi sequel di un gioco che ha fatto la storia. Il Source Engine è tutt'ora uno dei motori grafici all'avanguardia. A livello di trama non ho nulla di dire e si completa con i due relativi DLC (Episode 1 ed Episode 2). Il gioco non stanca e l'IA del Source è davvero eccelsa. Non ha fatto un passo indietro dal 1998.

Ritornadno ad HL2 la modalità single-player (ovvero la trama) emrita di essere giocata. Il deathmatch di HL2, invece, è un semplice passatempo e i vari server che ci sono cercano di rebndere vivo il gioco anche al termine della campagna principale. Lo consiglio vivamente a tutti: sia quelli a cui non piacciono gli FPS che a quelli amano gli FPS in quanto è un gioco completo fatto di enigmi, di una lore solida e armi innovative.

L'ho amato, lo amo e lo amerò.

Old game I used to play when I was younger. Bought it on a sale and still good. Still don't get the ending though. It's a nice   mix between lineair and exploration. Sometimes I didn't know what to do however, as the game gives no direct clues on where you have to go, making me sometimes go all the way back from where I came lol.. It's a game where u kinda have to think outside of the box. 

You have to use physic props to get on specific higher grounds, when you're in a sewer and the water is low but you have to get somewhere that is higher you have to think "can I change the water level" and look for a red valve. Sh!t that I would never come up with lol. The only thing I dislike about the game is the Ravenholm mission. It's just so horribly to go through, and getting the "Zombie Chopper" achievement even took me several retries. But alas, that's just my opinion on it. 

You do have to use your mind when playing unlike moi. It's an amazing game, and aged well. Gonna hunt for the lambda achievement and I'm gonna play Episode 1 & 2 aswell because I'm missing out on sh!t that's over 10 years old.

HλLF-LIFE 2 






Half-Life 2 is a(n) First-person Shooter, this game is a sequel to the first game HλLF-LIFE (Go check it out if you haven't!) and my 2nd purchase on this game. The game starts off basically where the last game left you, with G-Man as the (Mysterious mysteryy...) guy telling you what you missed since the past approx. 20 years. Yeah, 20 GODDAMNED YEARS. And that he has a new "job" offer for you. He leaves you at a train to City-17 and on way to Nova Prospekt but you meet your old friend (Barney Calhoun!) and he picks you off before you get obliterated at Nova Prospekt. Not going to write much about the storyline since that would be a LOT of spoilers for the people who haven't played this game.

Gameplay:
It's pretty much HλLF-LIFE but with little adjustments such as graphics and how the game plays, (New physics engine: Source) so you have new physics puzzles! yaaay!
Graphics: The year that this game was released, the graphics were actually very good for it's time. (The water and the sky on the boat levels are just amazing!)
Sound: The sound effects on this game are just over-the top, That sound when you walk on water or wet surface. Still gives me chills
Attention to detail: VALVe is just known for paying very much attention-to detail. When you exit your car and leave it in an open space, After couple minutes pigeons will come and sh*t on your car! and much more!


Overall: This game is a masterpiece, you will definetely enjoy it (i have and it's my 2nd time playing it) so i suggest that after you finish this review, to go and buy it!

9.5/10
афыафыаафыафыаыфаыфаыфаыф

Bon par où commencer... Je vient de finir ce jeu et c'est tout simplement pour moi une immense réussite sur plusieurs facettes. Premièrement, l'histoire qui m'a rattachée et m'a même forcée à jouer plus souvent qu'autrement, il y a quelque chose d'héroïque, de valorisant, et un point sentimental qui pousse à continuer de jouer tête baissée ! Deuxièmement, le moteur du jeu qui est sans contredit un pièce tournante de cette opus, toutes les interactions et les puzzles à franchir ont quasiment un rapport direct avec le nouveau moteur de jeu qui permet un interactivité avec le monde dans lequel on évolue . Par contre selon moi il y a quelque bémol à souligné mais qui ne devraient pas vous faire changer d'avis quant à l'acquisition de ce jeu. Pour ma part je trouve que dans certaines parties il était un peu difficile de se retrouver et de savoir où aller pour progresser, ce qui, pour quelques situations, est très fâchant puisque qu'on se retrouver tué, tué et encore tué sans savoir vraiment quoi faire. De plus, sur une note personnelle, j'ai trouvé que l'histoire se déroulait beaucoup sans les personnages principaux qui manquaient à l'appel dans des situations qui étaient importantes pour le cour de l'histoire. Pour conclure, je pense que Half-Life 2 bien qu'il soit un peu âgé, saura ravir un amateur de FPS qui rechercher un tout nouveau genre de jeu, puisque qu'il est lui-même le précurseur de nombreux FPS moderne qui nous sont proposés. Un gros 10/10 pour moi !

Hey you! Yes you, are you reading the reviews to see if the game is worth the money? Why bother? Buy it straight away! You won't regret it. But if you already bought it but haven't played it, play it! Its good. If you played it and didn't like it well.....ok

Anyway, pros cons bluh blah bleugh :

Pros :
+ Good graphics for its time
+ Performs really well on a toaster! (Mine)
+ Good story (If you haven't played Half-Life 1 you might not get somethings ex: wtf is black mesa)
+ Nice mechanics? I guess?
+ Really cheap when sale goes on (When I bought it)

Cons :
- You might get stuck on a few places (I had to look up a walkthrough on a few places)
- The fact that you dont say anything in the game. (ever)
- Heart attacking, pace inducing, jumping, eating, small MOTHERF*****G HEADCRABS WTF

TL;DR buy it [spoiler] kneega [/spoiler]

O jogo é muito bom, um dos melhores fps ja criados sem duvida, porem uma parte dos players sentem nauseas e tonturas ao jogar esse jogo, eu mesmo senti e após pesquisar sobre descobri que não era o unico, existem alguns passos que podem ser feitos para resolver isso

*Utilize monitores com taxa de atualização de 85Hz ou mais....

*Vá em configurações, abre as configurações de video e vai ter a seguinte opção... "Field Of View" em 75, aumente essa configuração até 90

*Deixe o jogo cravado no maximo em 60 fps, mais que isso pode dar enjoos

Espero ter ajudado, vlws, flws

Candidato a ser uno de los mejores juegos de la historia.

Desde que salio hasta día de hoy , lo que significo este juego para la industria de los videojuegos fue simplemente enorme , añadiendo mécanicas de juego muy originales , nuevo motor grafico , una nueva inteligencia artificial y una gran historia la hacen una continuación perfecta para la saga. 

Ojalá que Half - Life 3 vea la luz algún día...
